name: General Culinary 6 Trivia Game | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What food derives its name from Tsap seui ( miscellaneous scraps)?
Where is the food coloring Cudbear extracted from?
Which food item is eaten at Passiontide?
What food item closely resembles the Swiss dried meat, Bindenfleisch?
Which food item does the phrase 'la politica de carciofo' describe?
questions.explanation:
artichoke.

	The phrase...used to describe the amount of patience to eat these complicated and leafy things...later went on to signify the patience in dealing with opponents in the political arena.

questions.text: Which of these fruits was mentioned several times in the Song of Solomon?
What animal-meat did Charles Darwin describe as 'the best meat I ever ate' during his travels to South America?
What is the Persian spice mixture which generally consists of: coriander, tumeric, cumin, cardamom, and black pepper?
What is the Indian name for a pickle?
What are the boiled, fertilized duck eggs sold in the Philippines called?
